channel.title: Teaching on Nicholas Yek
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Nicholas Yek

item.title: New here? README
item.description: This microsite contains COMPLETELY OPTIONAL supplementary material, tips and explainers for CG1111A coursework for the Academic Year 23/24. The amount of content I post here will be based on student feedback and academic needs. This page will be (a)periodically updated as the semester progresses! Note: The contents of this site are NOT officially sanctioned by the ECE department. This is an initiative (and a little project) by me to provide a richer and more targetted learning experience for CG1111A.

item.title: New here? README
item.description: Important Links: Keep these under your pillow… CS2113 webpage Java Coding Standards Git Standards This microsite contains COMPLETELY OPTIONAL supplementary material, tips and explainers for CS2113 coursework for the Academic Year 23/24. The intent is to supplement what CS2113 already teaches you for those willing to stretch, and give a more targetted learning experience for this course. The amount of content I post here will be based on student feedback and academic needs.
